nodes.text: Star Wars Little Golden Book Collection
The Star Wars Little Golden Book Collection is a hardcover collection of seven young-reader Star Wars titles in the Golden Books series. It was published on July 26, 2016.
The collected titles include The Phantom Menace, Attack of the Clones, Revenge of the Sith, A New Hope, The Empire Strikes Back, Return of the Jedi, and The Force Awakens.

The Star Wars Little Golden Book Collection includes retellings of The Phantom Menace, Attack of the Clones, Revenge of the Sith, A New Hope, The Empire Strikes Back, Return of the Jedi, and The Force Awakens in one hardcover volume. Featuring stunning retro illustrations, this collection is perfect for Star Wars—and Little Golden Book—fans of all ages.
